item.title: Rust on ESP32
item.description: Start to look at the toolchain for Rust on ESP32 family modules. After some googling, here is the first result. Clearly the toolchain is working in its early stage. $ cargo build OK. But esptool does not work. This requires further investigation. Both espflash and espmonitor are working. Instead the flashing tool from esp-idf is used directly to flash one esp32 dev board. References: Rust on ESP32 rust esp32 std demo
